string-array.name: sub_one_items_arrray_default
string-array.item: Nothing to display

string-array.name: desc_a_one
string-array.item:
A career starts with knowing about the perfect 
industry,qualification and job for you. 
SahiCareer will help you realise your passion, 
interests, and abilities and facilitate your 
career goals through a concrete career plan.

string-array.name: desc_a_two
string-array.item:
SahiCareer is different and better on multiple 
counts. 
Firstly, our career test is the most scientific and 
well researched test, with the highest accuracy and 
reliability. 
Secondly, all career counsellors possess deep 
knowledge,have a psychology or MSW background, 
and are trained to counsel youth in the best 
possible way. 
Thirdly, we go further in helping you with your 
dream career by providing you with additional 
career services,resume builder,resume services, 
school and college information. 
All of this to help you in your career! 
Fourth,we have highly established industry mentors 
from different industries and with strong experience 
to personally mentor the SahiCareer youth.?

string-array.name: desc_b_one
string-array.item:
Our career assessment test is the most reliable and 
accurate test. Most tests either test aptitude 
or interest. 
SahiCareer's test is multi-faceted and tests aptitude, 
interest, personality and work style! 
It has been designed after extensive research with 
youth, and suggests the best possible careers. 
Our test can also be customised in multiple 
languages and for different industries. 
We are also continually updating and improving our 
test through ongoing research.

string-array.name: desc_b_two
string-array.item:
Our test has proven to be highly reliable with youth. 
The test uses the best in class research framework 
and has the unique ability to comprehensively 
analyse an individual's best career possibilities

string-array.name: desc_b_three
string-array.item: Yes, you can continue your assessment test at your \nconvenience. However, we believe that it is best to \nfinish the test in one sitting.

string-array.name: desc_b_four
string-array.item:
Free assessment will give you the basic career 
results.While a free test is useful for your career, 
the paid career assessment test will help you with 
many additional things. 
The paid assessment report will give you details 
about your 
1) Interests 
2) Abilities 
3) Personality 
4) Workstyle 
In addition to this, the detailed assessment report 
will get into the details of each career and all 
potential career paths that you are suitable for you. 
This detailed career report can work as a great 
guide for you whenever you are looking to make 
career decisions, now or in the future.

string-array.name: desc_c_one
string-array.item:
We have highly experienced counsellor who have 
extensive experience in working with you, 
and who will help you in exploring and 
understanding your best career. 
All SahiCareer counsellors have a psychology 
or MSW background.

string-array.name: desc_c_two
string-array.item:
Our career counsellor will help you develop a 
broader understanding of your own self and about 
work and education, further helping you make 
informed educational, career and life decisions.

string-array.name: desc_c_three
string-array.item:
Our career counsellors work with individuals at 
various stages in their careers. They will help 
you determine what careers you are best suited 
for given your interests, personality, abilities 
and work style. Our counsellor will develop your 
career plan to improve your current career and 
provide advice about entering a new profession.

string-array.name: desc_c_four
string-array.item:
Family and friends are our well-wishers. 
It is always good to get an external opinion also, 
from career experts. You will always have the 
choice to determine your own career, after all.

string-array.name: desc_c_five
string-array.item: We provide three modes counselling: Face to Face, \nVideo and Telephonic counselling.

string-array.name: desc_d_one
string-array.item:
We have experienced industry mentors to 
personally guide. 
We help you find the right mentor by matching you 
with a mentor who is from a similar industry, 
educational background and location.

string-array.name: desc_d_two
string-array.item:
Our mentors are successful professionals, are 
armed with diverse industry experience, are 
helpful and are extremely keen to facilitate 
the youth towards their best careers!

string-array.name: desc_e_one
string-array.item:
Our career explorer is a convenient, easy to use, 
online resource that provides instructive, 
insightful information that can empower you to 
take control of your career exploration journey 
in few easy steps.

string-array.name: desc_e_two
string-array.item:
In making career decisions, the work you choose 
to pursue will have a direct impact on the way 
you live your life. Good career planning and 
decision-making involves learning about careers, 
types of work, educational requirements, and job 
functions. These are critically important in 
understanding which careers meet your interests 
and goals.

string-array.name: desc_e_three
string-array.item:
Our career explorer can't tell you your perfect job. 
It does however allow you to match your personal 
attitudes and behaviours to the careers database 
so you can explore potential careers and understand 
them more.

string-array.name: desc_f_one
string-array.item:
Our resume generator works automatically. 
You simply enter in data, and you get the output. 
The output is the resume which is professional 
and elegant. At each stage of Building the resume, 
we will guide you and give examples. Besides that, 
we have several experts from different industry 
who will give you tips make your resume more 
attractive and professional.

string-array.name: desc_f_two
string-array.item: Resume is the back bone of your job application \nand plays a very important role in influencing \nthe recruiter hire/ interview you.

string-array.name: desc_f_three
string-array.item: Our online resume builder gives is absolutely free!

string-array.name: desc_f_four
string-array.item:
Yes, we understand it's not easy to build a great 
resume.Which is why we have a team of experts 
who analyse your resume, consult you and prepare 
a revised,professional and highly impactful resume?

string-array.name: desc_g_one
string-array.item:
The students have a long term career plan 
prepared for them. They become self-aware 
and goal-oriented from an early age. 
The students also have an external voice 
to share their thoughts, beliefs and opinions. 
The students benefit immensely, which results in 
massive benefit for the school. The college has a 
strong marketing tool to attract future students, 
builds stronger credibility, and has a stronger, 
more engaged and successful alumni.

string-array.name: desc_g_two
string-array.item:
Our long term student guidance plan keeps the 
student's career well-being in focus at all times. 
We track a student?s progress, report to the 
management, and plan interventions if required. 

We also involve parents and the school 
managementin decision-making, since they are 
the key influencers for the children.

string-array.name: desc_h_one
string-array.item:
College is a critical time for the students careers. 
The students have a long term career plan 
prepared for them. 
They become self-aware and goal-oriented 
from an early age. The students also have an 
external voice to share their thoughts, beliefs and 
opinions. 
The students benefit immensely, which results in 
massive benefit for the college. The college has a 
strong marketing tool to attract future students, 
builds stronger credibility, and has a stronger, 
more engaged and successful alumni.

string-array.name: desc_h_two
string-array.item:
Our long term student guidance plan keeps the 
student's career well-being in focus at all times. 
We track a student's progress, report to the 
management, and plan interventions if required. 
We also involve parents and the school 
management in decision-making, since they are 
the key influencers for the children.

string-array.name: desc_i_one
string-array.item:
SahiCareer has the following services which are the 
best for career guidance: Most scientific and 
accurate career assessment test Highly skilled 
counsellors,with prior experience of counselling 
youth Strong mentorship system, with a solid base 
of industry professionals Allied services on the 
portal ?resume services, institutional data, 
career blogs

string-array.name: desc_j_one
string-array.item:
SahiCareer guarantees data confidentially. 
We believe data is of utmost important, and will 
sign a non-disclosure agreement with you. 
All data will be kept securely, and safely.

string-array.name: desc_j_two
string-array.item:
Yes, parents are involved. Since parents are critical 
influencers in the career planning process of their 
children,we invite parents to be a part of 
counselling, and also share their child's progress 
with them.

string-array.name: desc_j_three
string-array.item: No. Apart from schools, colleges and individuals, \nwe do not have any other commercial partners.

string-array.name: desc_j_four
string-array.item: The tests are completely online, and compatible \nwith any device or browser.

Intermediate
